title: The Guys Review Harry Potter…Will Mike D Get Punished? + Lunchbox Reveals He Gets Naked Massages + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should I Let My 8 Year Old Quit First Year of Football
itunes:title: The Guys Review Harry Potter…Will Mike D Get Punished? + Lunchbox Reveals He Gets Naked Massages + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should I Let My 8 Year Old Quit First Year of Football
description:
Bobby, Eddie and Lunchbox review Harry Potter and The Sorcerer’s Stone that Mike D said would change their lives. If they don’t collectively rate it 4/5…Mike D will be punished. They also take a quiz to make sure they watched it. Lunchbox revealed to Bobby’s wife Caitlin that he gets naked massages and we can’t believe it. Bobby reads an email from a listener who needs help with her son wanting to quit football after they agreed he would finish the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
